entry.em: ..COLD WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THURSDAY

entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY
PATCHY BLOWING SNOW THIS MORNING
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SNOW THIS AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 18
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH THIS MORNING
CHANCE OF SNOW 20 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 1 BELOW THIS MORNING

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 2 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH IN THE EVENING
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 18
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 8 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 2 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S
CALM WINDS

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
